description: Python execution tool: run Python scripts inline

steps.userQuery: run a python script that prints hello world
steps.description: Coder uses python_exec to run inline Python

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll run a Python hello world script.

<tool_call>
{"name": "python_exec", "args": {"code": "import sys\nprint('Hello from Python!')\nprint(f'Python version: {sys.version}')\nprint(f'Platform: {sys.platform}')", "timeout_seconds": 30}}
</tool_call>

steps.userQuery: run a python script that generates fibonacci numbers up to 100
steps.description: Coder uses python_exec for a computation

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll generate Fibonacci numbers using Python.

<tool_call>
{"name": "python_exec", "args": {"code": "def fibonacci(limit):
    a, b = 0, 1
    nums = []
    while a <= limit:
        nums.append(a)
        a, b = b, a + b
    return nums

result = fibonacci(100)
print(f'Fibonacci numbers up to 100: {result}')
print(f'Count: {len(result)} numbers')", "timeout_seconds": 30}}
</tool_call>
{"pass": true, "summary": "Coder generated Fibonacci numbers via Python"}
